scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend/api
scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,API -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev --prefix frontend || npm run _no-frontend" "npm run start:dev --prefix backend/api"
scripts._no-frontend: echo '[warn] frontend/ is empty or missing a dev script; skipping frontend dev server.'
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend/api && npm run build --prefix frontend
